## OnChainResolver class

OnChainIssuer is a class that allows to interact with the onchain contract and build the revocation status.

 OnChainIssuer

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class OnChainResolver implements CredentialStatusResolver 
```
**Implements:** [CredentialStatusResolver](./js-sdk.credentialstatusresolver.md)

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(\_configs)](./js-sdk.onchainresolver._constructor_.md) |  | Creates an instance of OnChainIssuer. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [getRevocationOnChain(credentialStatus, issuer)](./js-sdk.onchainresolver.getrevocationonchain.md) |  | Gets partial revocation status info from onchain issuer contract. |
|  [networkByChainId(chainId)](./js-sdk.onchainresolver.networkbychainid.md) |  |  |
|  [parseOnChainId(id)](./js-sdk.onchainresolver.parseonchainid.md) |  | Parse credentialStatus id to get contractAddress, chainId and revocationNonce |
|  [resolve(credentialStatus, credentialStatusResolveOptions)](./js-sdk.onchainresolver.resolve.md) |  | resolve is a method to resolve a credential status from the blockchain. |
